mapper.select: SELECT s.str_name, s.str_tel, s.str_address, r.rsv_no, r.rsv_day, r.rsv_time, r.rsv_personnel, r.rsv_sub_id, r.rsv_sub_name, r.rsv_sub_tel, r.rsv_sub_email, r.rsv_sub_request, r.str_number, r.rsv_delete, r.rsv_code FROM `reservation` r INNER JOIN `store` s ON r.str_number = s.str_number WHERE r.rsv_no=#{rsv_no}

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS exp, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS com, SUM(CASE WHEN rsv_code=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS can FROM `reservation` WHERE rsv_sub_id=#{rsv_sub_id}
